text: @realDonaldTrump So you were just postering up there, shaking your infected hands, @vp kissing your a$$,while the Dems were working hard, making a deal with Mnuchin to help save Americans from coronavirus and bankruptcy. Thank you @SpeakerPelosi you are a leader we can count on.#TrumpsCatastrophe
